Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams Struct Reference
External Device Interface API » External Video Decoder API » TVP5158 Video Decoder API

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_AUDIO_MODE. More...

#include <bsp_tvp5158.h>

Data Fields

UInt32 deviceNum

Detailed Description

Arguments for IOCTL_BSP_TVP5158_SET_AUDIO_MODE.

The audio mode is applicable for all channels associated with the device 'deviceNum'.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::audioVolume

Audio volume, Valid values: 0..8. Refer to TVP5158 datasheet for details.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::cascadeStage

Cascade stage number, Valid values: 0..3.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::deviceNum

Device number for which to apply the audio parameters.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::dspModeEnable

TRUE: DSP data format mode, FALSE: I2S data format mode.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::masterModeEnable

TRUE: Master mode of operation, FALSE: Slave mode of operation.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::samplingHz

Audio sampling rate in Hz, Valid values: 8000, 16000.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::tdmChannelNum

Number of TDM channels: 0: 2CH, 1: 4CH, 2: 8CH, 3: 12CH 4: 16CH.

UInt32 Bsp_Tvp5158AudioModeParams::ulawEnable

TRUE: 8-bit ulaw data format mode, FALSE: 16-bit PCM data format mode.
